# string-add

Add arbitrarily long numbers together

**First compile the zig program**

```bash
zig build
```

**Then run the executable**
```bash
./zig-out/bin/string-add 9999991313123123 390840948290482304823048
```

which produces stdout as `390840958290473617946171` as the answer.

## Adding two big numbers

```bash
./zig-out/bin/string-add  
```

produces 

```txt

```
